channel.title: Comments on: Flourless Chocolate and Almond Cake

item.title: By: Carolyn
item.dc:creator: Carolyn
item.description:
Hi Anita,
I've been making your cake for a few years now. I love it! Everyone who eats it loves it! I even made it for my brother's GF wedding.
I bake it for 28 minutes so it's very fudgy and frost it with a vanilla buttercream.
Thanks! Carolyn in Chicago
item.content:encoded:
Hi Anita,

I’ve been making your cake for a few years now. I love it! Everyone who eats it loves it! I even made it for my brother’s GF wedding.

I bake it for 28 minutes so it’s very fudgy and frost it with a vanilla buttercream.

Thanks!
Carolyn in Chicago

item.title: By: June
item.dc:creator: June
item.description: Hello! (If you could answer this today, I would be very grateful!) My boyfriend's b-day is tomorrow and I'm planning to make him this cake, but I want to include some fruit in it, something like bananas - he really likes them, and maybe a hint of oranges on the top?! I don't know if it affects the composition in some way, so I really need some advice! Thank you and have a nice day! :)
item.content:encoded:
Hello! (If you could answer this today, I would be very grateful!)
My boyfriend’s b-day is tomorrow and I’m planning to make him this cake, but I want to include some fruit in it, something like bananas – he really likes them, and maybe a hint of oranges on the top?! I don’t know if it affects the composition in some way, so I really need some advice! Thank you and have a nice day! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Kirsten
item.dc:creator: Kirsten
item.description:
I have just put this in the oven, for Ms 6's birthday party tomorrow. A friend commented today that they would probably not waste a cake like this on kids, with all the almond meal and so on. But i figure, I don't bake cake that often, I might as well make it good!
Besides, I'm trying to reduce our overall gluten intake. But really, this cake just looks too delicious to pass up! I am going to try your choc-a-block trifle next :)
item.content:encoded:
I have just put this in the oven, for Ms 6’s birthday party tomorrow. A friend commented today that they would probably not waste a cake like this on kids, with all the almond meal and so on. But i figure, I don’t bake cake that often, I might as well make it good!

Besides, I’m trying to reduce our overall gluten intake. But really, this cake just looks too delicious to pass up! I am going to try your choc-a-block trifle next ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Flynn
item.dc:creator: Flynn
item.description: I just made this for a dinner party. It was a huge success. I skippednthe kahlua, used a mix of almond and flaxseed meal just to boost the health benefit and it was delicious. Also, instead of icing sugar over it before serving, used more almond meal, which looked great.
item.content:encoded: I just made this for a dinner party. It was a huge success. I skippednthe kahlua, used a mix of almond and flaxseed meal just to boost the health benefit and it was delicious. Also, instead of icing sugar over it before serving, used more almond meal, which looked great.

item.title: By: RadzD
item.dc:creator: RadzD
item.description: Made this cake last night for hubby's birthday. He said it was my best chocolate cake to date. I enjoyed it as well. used recipe as per instructions omitting the kahlua...baked at 180 for exactly 40minutes. half the cake left today, and still very moist, soft. Im a celiac so this will regularily be a feature for my gluten free cooking. thanks :-)
item.content:encoded: Made this cake last night for hubby’s birthday. He said it was my best chocolate cake to date. I enjoyed it as well. used recipe as per instructions omitting the kahlua…baked at 180 for exactly 40minutes. half the cake left today, and still very moist, soft. Im a celiac so this will regularily be a feature for my gluten free cooking. thanks ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Frank Foodie
item.dc:creator: Frank Foodie
item.description: Flourless cake is so popular now days because people are wanting a more thick rich texture to their cakes. I have had a few different types of almond cakes and almond is a great additive.
item.content:encoded: Flourless cake is so popular now days because people are wanting a more thick rich texture to their cakes. I have had a few different types of almond cakes and almond is a great additive.

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Lorraine - Thanks :) I did love that it was so moist it didn't need icing.
Hi Arwen - Yes, definitely berries. I had a lovely berry compote with a flourless chocolate cake the other day at a cafe, and it was fantastic!
Hi Alexandra - Thanks!
Hi Justcooknyc - Hope you do try it, and check out the friands I've made with almond meal too - they're great!
Hi Julia - :P Thanks, I do love my baking!
Hi FFichiban - Oh, better start baking again :)
Hi Parita - Good luck when you try one, I'm sure it'll be great.
Hi Maria - Thanks :) . I really liked the way it sank too, it looked like the one at the store.. only it tasted better :) hehe
item.content:encoded:
Hi Lorraine – Thanks ðŸ™‚ I did love that it was so moist it didn’t need icing.

Hi Arwen – Yes, definitely berries. I had a lovely berry compote with a flourless chocolate cake the other day at a cafe, and it was fantastic!

Hi Alexandra – Thanks!

Hi Justcooknyc – Hope you do try it, and check out the friands I’ve made with almond meal too – they’re great!

Hi Julia – ðŸ˜› Thanks, I do love my baking!

Hi FFichiban – Oh, better start baking again ðŸ™‚

Hi Parita – Good luck when you try one, I’m sure it’ll be great.

Hi Maria – Thanks ðŸ™‚ . I really liked the way it sank too, it looked like the one at the store.. only it tasted better ðŸ™‚ hehe

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: You have a real knack with baking cakes. Despite you thinking this sank a bit its actually quite appealing. I think it look fantastic and probably tastes even better!
item.content:encoded: You have a real knack with baking cakes. Despite you thinking this sank a bit its actually quite appealing. I think it look fantastic and probably tastes even better!

item.title: By: parita
item.dc:creator: parita
item.description: Wow the cake looks deliciously chocolaty...m still to prepare a flourless chocolate cake...
item.content:encoded: Wow the cake looks deliciously chocolaty…m still to prepare a flourless chocolate cake…

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Oohh I think I have to try this recipe sooonnn since I haven't baked in toooooo long! :) yuumm
